# Security Policy

## Supported Versions
We currently support the latest minor release only. Older releases may receive fixes at the maintainers' discretion.

| Version | Supported |
| ------- | --------- |
| 0.1.x   | âœ…        |

## Reporting a Vulnerability
- Email `patrikm53@gmail.com` with the subject "FastApp Security Disclosure".
- Include detailed steps to reproduce the issue, potential impact, and any suggested fixes.
- We aim to acknowledge reports within 48 hours and provide an initial response within 5 business days.
- After validating the issue, we will coordinate a disclosure timeline. Please do not publicly disclose the vulnerability until a fix is released.

## Preferred Languages
Please submit reports in English.

## Security Updates
We publish fixes via regular releases. Subscribe to GitHub releases or watch the repository to stay informed.
